channel.title: Server Problem
channel.description:
Hey listen,
I just edited my server 3 times in client.java and autospawn.cfg and shops.cfg client.java & autospawn.cfg - For full legends guild Shops.cfg & autospawn.cfg & client.java - to fix smithing shop and for server and adding npcs
Then suddenly after all those updates my server began to get laggier then it shutted Then suddenly my runeserver.bat closed i clicked on it again and try to log on but it wouldn't let anyone in what happened? I did full legends guild from billygotshot's tut and smithing I needed to add a smithing store - Smithy's Bar Shop[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:07:36 AM[/size][hr]Oh yea and i edited playerhandler.java o change maximum players to 99999[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:14:26 AM[/size][hr]Also, Whoever helps gets admin on MF-PARADISE and might even get my source (i only give my source to special people)[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:15:59 AM[/size][hr]and if there recovery fix for my server (project16 based) i will pm the address to download[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:18:05 AM[/size][hr]well can anyone help?

item.title: Server Problem

item.description:
@dilip wrote:

change ur max players to like 78 [br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:27:15 AM[/size][hr]now u help me in my topic

item.title: Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @Haiku01 Haiku01
item.description:
@Haiku01 wrote:

Hey listen,

I just edited my server 3 times in client.java and autospawn.cfg and shops.cfg
client.java & autospawn.cfg - For full legends guild
Shops.cfg & autospawn.cfg & client.java - to fix smithing shop and for server and adding npcs

Then suddenly after all those updates my server began to get laggier then it shutted
Then suddenly my runeserver.bat closed i clicked on it again and try to log on but it wouldn’t let anyone in
what happened?
I did full legends guild from billygotshot’s tut and smithing I needed to add a smithing store - Smithy’s Bar Shop[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:07:36 AM[/size][hr]Oh yea and i edited playerhandler.java o change maximum players to 99999[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:14:26 AM[/size][hr]Also, Whoever helps gets admin on MF-PARADISE and might even get my source (i only give my source to special people)[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:15:59 AM[/size][hr]and if there recovery fix for my server (project16 based) i will pm the address to download[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:18:05 AM[/size][hr]well can anyone help?

Read full topic
